rooms.description: Wide entrance area with floor-to-ceiling windows enhancing natural light.
Open-plan living and kitchen combined space with Mediterranean design, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows and decorative tiles.
Adjacent dining area seamlessly integrated into the open-plan concept.
Modern Mediterranean kitchen with ample storage and floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light.
Two-car garage designed to accommodate spacious vehicles along with storage area.
Service utility room adjoining the kitchen and living area.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows that enhance natural light in all primary spaces, in compliance with Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
Large double door entrance ensuring a welcoming and auspicious entry according to Vastu norms.
